attributes.action: Remove the burden of legislation that prevents citizens in this country volunteering to help each other for fear of falling foul of the law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Excessive and over the top interference from Health & Safety, Child Protection and Data Protection bodies, designed to protect people, are actually having a corrosive and damaging effect on British life with people becoming afraid to 'lend a hand' because of all the hurdles placed before them. This is highlighted by the massively unpopular Vetting & Barring Scheme and the case of 2 Police Officers challenged for sharing Child Minding Arrangements
